name: rapidforge
description: Release is a self-hosted DevOps platform that automates environment creation, previews, and deployments with a focus on simplifying cloud-native workflows via UI or API.
features: Environment automation: Create isolated development, staging, and production environments with a single command.
Preview deployments: Generate temporary environments for pull requests to test changes before merging.
Container orchestration: Deploy applications to Kubernetes clusters with automated configuration and scaling.
CI/CD integration: Connect to GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket for automatic deployments on code changes.
Infrastructure as code: Define environments using declarative configuration files for reproducible deployments.
Resource management: Monitor CPU, memory, and storage usage across all environments from a central dashboard.
Rollback support: Quickly revert to previous versions when deployments fail or issues are discovered.
Secret management: Store and inject environment variables and credentials securely into applications.
Multi-cloud support: Deploy to AWS, GCP, Azure, or on-premises infrastructure from the same platform.
Team collaboration: Share environments and deployment controls with team members using role-based access.
API-first design: Automate workflows and integrate with existing tools using comprehensive REST APIs.
Cost tracking: Monitor cloud spending per environment to optimize resource allocation and budgets.
